title: gb-en Windows 10 Anniversary Edition July Update 1607 Official M
description:
gb-en Windows 10 Anniversary Edition July Update 1607 Official MSDN ISO en-gb_windows_10_multiple_editions_version_1607_updated_jul_2016_x64_dvd_9058848.iso

It is NOT activated, just providing it for people that want to do a clean install of the official ISO.

DO NOT install this if you haven't already upgraded your Windows 7 or Windows 8 to Windows 10. You can do a clean install and it'll be activated AFTER you've already upgraded to Windows 10 once or have bought a valid licence.

if you've already upgraded Windows 7/8 Home etc use the Windows 10 Home install on booting the DVD or from USB. If you've upgraded Pro already use the Pro install.

You can make a USB install using Rufus which is free. 
 
https://rufus.akeo.ie/ Make a GPT USB key if your PC supports UEFI, make a MBR key if it doesn't support UEFI.
Boot from USB using UEFI if you made a GPT USB. If you can't boot UEFI you never used the GPT option in RUFUS or your BIOS doesn't support UEFI.

You can use this free Hash Checker http://www.nirsoft.net/utils/hash_my_files.html to see the SHA1 of the ISO.

Check SHA-1 in Details on MSDN Website for the 1607 en-GB version.
 
https://msdn.microsoft.com/subscriptions/downloads/#searchTerm=windows%2010%201607&ProductFamilyId=0&Languages=en&Architectures=x64&ProductFamilyIds=657&FileExtensions=.iso&PageSize=10&PageIndex=0&FileId=0

Please seed at least a 1:1 ratio.

Hope this helps some. 

Edit: You can download the official Windows 10 Anniversary Update .iso from here. 
 
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/software-download/windows10ISO/

Different file name but same SHA-1 as the MSDN version. :)
